Texts.Chs: 关于一副盔甲的描述性文字。
虽然字迹很难辨认，但这本书中有关于一副盔甲的详细信息，它各种非同寻常的材料组成。书中说需要五块诺克石锭，一本远古之书和五个远古残卷，然后再某种祭坛上完成...
Texts.Eng: While hard to decipher, there are schematics within this book that detail a shield, of sorts, composed of various unusual materials. It states that one should place 5 Noxcium bars, an Elder Tome and 5 Elder Fragments within some sort of altar...
